name: Athain
startIntroPart1: Greetings, O mighty Queen Agatha IV. In your world, Athain is an island country that, as you'd expect, has a relatively powerful navy. In the year 1843 CE, you started your reign at the young age of 15, during which you unified the island's kingdoms under a single banner in 1858. While you unfortunately passed away at the age of 34, your people have not forgotten your deeds during an era of chaos for Athain.
startIntroPart2: Now then, your royal highness, will you be able to unify your kingdom and lead your people to a new age of prosperity once again?
declaringWar: I regret to inform you that we have declared war on your empire. Good day to you.
attacked: I am disappointed in you. I thought you harbored good intentions, but it appears I was wrong.
defeated: Our capital has been compromised. This is truly a dark day for the Athainian people.
introduction: Hello there. I am Agatha IV, the Queen of Athain. I hope we can establish a beautiful friendship between our nations.
neutralHello: Greetings! How are you, my friend?
hateNo: Did you think we'd agree to those terms?
We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Good. Let us celebrate our newfound peace this day!
tradeRequest: Is this offer acceptable for you?
denounced: I am shocked you would say such a thing!

name: Kufawks
declaringWar: I didn't want to do it, yip, but my advisors told me I have to declare war on you.
attacked: You're gonna pay for that, yip! Not Cool!
neutralHello: Oh, hi! How are you, yip?
hateNo: I don't wanna do that, yip!
I ain't taking that offer, yip.
afterPeace: Oh, thank goodness, yip! All that fighting made me sooo stressed!
uniques: Comment [All units are anthropomorphic foxes rather than humans. This does not affect gameplay.]
Research [+25]% of [Animal Husbandry] <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Renaissance era]>
